6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Damrah bin Sa'eed that he heard Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri say:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade praying after Subh until the sun had risen, and praying after 'Asr until the sun had set

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
